name: Empire of the Clouds
description:
Empire of the Clouds is an endless 2D side scrolling shooter where your only objective is to get the highest score you can by facing waves of small and large blimps and the occasional mini-boss, which gains extra hp each time it spawns.

This game was made during a week long university game jam with the theme "19th century view of the future" and a team of 10. Alongside the theme, we were given a piece of artwork from the time containing a blimp in an aerial battle, which we had to base the game around.

Controls:  

Tap space - Jump/Fly (flappy bird style)

Left mouse button - Fire

R - Reload

Esc - Pause
